abstract: Realogy, the struggling parent of real estate brokers like Coldwell Banker, was able to stave off default after striking a deal with Carl C. Icahn to help pay down its senior loans, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Realogy, the struggling parent of real estate brokers like Coldwell Banker, was able to stave off default after striking a deal with Carl C. Icahn to help pay down its senior loans, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Realogy, the struggling parent of real estate brokers like Coldwell Banker and Century 21 and owned by the private equity firm Apollo Global Management, was able to stave off default after striking a deal with Carl C. Icahn to help pay down its senior loans, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: Realogy, Owned by Apollo, Sells Debt in Deal With Icahn
